home.hero_subheader: Build your own personal brand with the help of Portfolio Press, the AI-powered career builder.

product.subheader: Learn how our product can kickstart your career.

body.title: No Code. No Templates. Just Plain English.
body.paragraph_1: Your resume does a lot... but it can't show your personality, adapt to different audiences, or grow with your career. That's where we come in.
body.paragraph_2: We take your existing resume and turn it into a sleek, modern website â€” with no technical skills required. You just upload your resume and tell us what you want. We'll do the rest.

pitch.title: Why Just Have a Resume, When You Can Have a Website?
pitch.subtitle: Recruiters and clients expect more than a PDF. A personal website shows initiative, creativity, and polish â€” with Portfolio Press, that's what you get without the hassle of building from scratch.

benefits.title: Our tool makes it effortless:
benefits.point_1: Upload Once, Done: Just submit your PDF resume â€” we extract the content and format it into a clean, mobile-friendly website.
benefits.point_2: Customize With Natural Language: Want a dark theme? A new font? A portfolio section? Just describe it in plain English â€” no menus, no drag-and-drop editors.
benefits.point_3: No Templates to Tweak: Skip the cookie-cutter designs. Your site is built around your content and preferences â€” not crammed into a template.
benefits.point_4: Share Anywhere: Once you're done, you can share your sandbox link for anyone to view.

applications.title: Whether you're a job seeker, freelancer, creative, or student, your resume should work harder for you. A personal website helps you:
applications.point_1: Stand out in a competitive job market
applications.point_3: Create a more dynamic, professional presence online
applications.summary: And with our natural language customization, you don't need to be a designer or developer. If you can describe what you want, you can make it happen.

footer.title: Ready to Build Your Resume Website?
footer.subtitle: It takes less than a minute to go from static PDF to live website. No setup. No coding. No fluff.
footer.closing: Turn your resume into a website today â€” it's fast, free, and all yours.

pricing.subheader: Discover the right plan for your needs.

cards.free_body: Great for exploring our basic capabilities. Comes with 5 free credits per month and limited testing.
cards.pro_body: Perfect for serious users. Gain 20 pro credits per month and access to our best model.
